title: A Flavour of German - Lesson 05
description: Spice up your language with A Flavour of German. Learn to use real German and increase your range of expression. In episode 05 you will learn to talk about being angry using idiomatic German. Access our lesson guide and enhanced podcasts from our website on http://www.languageflavours.com
content:encoded: Spice up your language with A Flavour of German. Learn to use real German and increase your range of expression. In episode 05 you will learn to talk about being angry using idiomatic German. Access our lesson guide and enhanced podcasts from our website on http://www.languageflavours.com
itunes:subtitle: Use idiomatic German to talk about being angry.
